author: abdel.stark
content: <@!489256758989029405> did you get a chance to implement the latest base fee computation and test it against the testnet ?

author: timbeiko
content: <@!301186049323958275> as an EIP editor, do you know why that is? Does Abdel need to re-submit your PR and have the auto-merge bot merge it in?

author: sky.cactus
content: <@574864862338088960> You just need to approve the PR via GitHub PR Review and the bot should automerge (though it may be broken at the moment, in which case an editor will merge instead).

author: mohseng
content: I don't think we can be sure miners will make less $ after 1559; it seems to me they'll make more dollars (less Eth).
